Spark of Life.name: Spark of Life
Spark of Life.fullText:
Everflame Guardian Attack 11Spark of Life

Flames erupt around your enemies, charring their flesh while comforting your allies.

Encounter        Fire, Healing, Implement, Primal
Standard Action      Area burst 1 within 10 squares

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Wisdom vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier fire damage.

Effect: Each bloodied ally in the burst regains 5 + your Wisdom modifier hit points.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 80.
Spark of Life.flavor: Flames erupt around your enemies, charring their flesh while comforting your allies.
Spark of Life.range:
Area burst 1 within 10 squares

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Wisdom vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier fire damage.

Effect: Each bloodied ally in the burst regains 5 + your Wisdom modifier hit points.
Spark of Life.effect: Each bloodied ally in the burst regains 5 + your Wisdom modifier hit points.

Elder Flame.name: Elder Flame
Elder Flame.fullText:
Everflame Guardian Attack 20Elder Flame

You call forth a living piece of Everflame and set it against your enemies.

Daily        Conjuration, Fire, Implement, Primal
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Effect: You conjure a shard of Everflame in an unoccupied square within range. The shard lasts until the end of the encounter. When any ally within 2 squares of the shard hits an enemy, the attack deals 1d10 extra fire damage to that enemy. As a move action, you can move the shard 5 squares. You can use the Elder Flame Attack power, centered on the shard. Doing so destroys the shard.


Elder Flame Attack

Encounter      Conjuration, Fire, Implement, Primal
Minor Action      Close burst 2

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Wisdom vs. Will

Hit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier fire damage.

Requirement: The Elder Flame power must be active for you to use this power.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 80.
Elder Flame.flavor: You call forth a living piece of Everflame and set it against your enemies.

Guardian's Shield.name: Guardian's Shield
Guardian's Shield.fullText:
Everflame Guardian Utility 12Guardian's Shield

You draw forth a tiny shard of Everflame. Under its halo, life flourishes.

Encounter        Fire, Primal
Minor Action      Close burst 2

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Each target gains resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn. The first time any enemy deals damage to the target before the end of your next turn, that enemy takes 5 fire damage.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 80.
